content:
1. Understanding and analyzing the value of playlisting on different platforms and how it affects the success of a song.
2. Determining the long-term benefits of getting on smaller but numerous playlists versus the largest playlists.
3. Investigating the value of Mood/Genre based playlists and how they impact song success.
4. Tracking and analyzing the impact of TikTok on new releases during release week and after the first week.
5. Conducting social listening on the full roster of artists to understand their audience and engagement.
6. Researching and gathering information for RIAA certifications for label copy.
7. Identifying and analyzing any other trends or shifts in the music industry that may impact the success of a song or artist.
